strings.SS2_NEMHUNTRESS2_DESCRIPTION:
The Nemesis Huntress engages against enemies slowly but ruthlessly with their deadly longbow and double headed hatchet.

<color=#CCD3E0>< ! > Death doesn't fear itself.
strings.SS2_NEMHUNTRESS2_OUTRO_FLAVOR: ..and so they left, finding a new home far away.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_PASSIVE_DESC: Highlight <style=cIsDamage>Weak Points</style> while in combat, which can be struck with all arrows for <style=cIsDamage>1.5x damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_PRIMARY_BOW_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>Agile</style>. Hold to <style=cIsUtility>charge</style>, and release to fire an arrow for up to <style=cIsDamage>400% damage</style>. Arrow <style=cIsUtility>velocity</style>, <style=cIsDamage>damage</style>, and <style=cIsUtility>accuracy</style> scale with charge level.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_SECONDARY_DESC: Swing and throw a boomeranging, piercing hatchet for <style=cIsDamage>240% damage</style>. Hits <style=cIsDamage>5 times per second</style> while in the air.
strings.SS2_KEYWORD_REARM: <style=cKeywordName>Rearming</style><style=cSub>Adds 2 more projectiles to the next use of primary, up to a maximum of 7.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_UTILITY_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>Agile</style>. <style=cIsDamage>Rearming</style>. <style=cIsUtility>Disappear</style> and <style=cIsUtility>teleport</style> a short distance. Can store up to <style=cIsUtility>3</style> charges.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_HUNTRESS_EXPLOSIVE_BOW_DESC: Swap the arrow of your next <style=cIsDamage>primary</style> with a <style=cIsDamage>stunning</style> arrow that explodes shortly after impact for <style=cIsDamage>400% damage</style>.
